puzzle.body: RedundantThrows check complains about custom exceptions, even in the same package. An exception is defined in the same package, and a method throws it. This checkstyle check complains. Let's fix this problem and enable the check.

NPE when parsing interfaces with embedded classes. This check fails with an NPE, when parsing an interface with a final class inside it. Let's try to reproduce and fix. Once fixed, remove this puzzle and enable the check again.
First line is correct, but second line is impropertly indented
Some text with proper indentation of the second and all consecutive lines.
